SMC_INT_STATUS (ENUM)
SMC_INT_STATUS (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE SMC_INT_STATUS :
Status of an interpolator instance.
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
IPO_UNKNOWN
0
Internal state that may not occur after a complete pass
of the
SMC_Interpolator
.
IPO_INIT
1
Initialization state; movement not started yet
IPO_ACCEL
2
Interpolation ongoing; currently accelerating
IPO_CONSTANT
3
Interpolation ongoing with constant velocity
IPO_DECEL
4
Interpolation ongoing; currently decelerating
IPO_FINISHED
5
Interpolation done
IPO_WAIT
6
Interpolation ongoing; currently waiting for example by a
stop input or a M-command
IPO_INCREASING_ACCEL
7
Interpolation ongoing; currently building up the
acceleration
IPO_DECREASING_ACCEL
8
Interpolation ongoing; currently ramping down the
acceleration
IPO_INCREASING_DECEL
9
Interpolation ongoing; currently building up the
deceleration
IPO_DECREASING_DECEL
10
Interpolation ongoing; currently ramping down the
deceleration

rows.Name: IPO_UNKNOWN
rows.Comment:
Internal state that may not occur after a complete pass
of theSMC_Interpolator.

rows.Name: IPO_INIT
rows.Comment: Initialization state; movement not started yet

rows.Name: IPO_WAIT
rows.Comment:
Interpolation ongoing; currently waiting for example by a
stop input or a M-command

rows.Name: IPO_INCREASING_ACCEL
rows.Comment:
Interpolation ongoing; currently building up the
acceleration

rows.Name: IPO_DECREASING_ACCEL
rows.Comment:
Interpolation ongoing; currently ramping down the
acceleration

rows.Name: IPO_INCREASING_DECEL
rows.Comment:
Interpolation ongoing; currently building up the
deceleration

rows.Name: IPO_DECREASING_DECEL
rows.Comment:
Interpolation ongoing; currently ramping down the
deceleration
